dc_title_s: Potential Geothermal Energy Sites: United States, Spring 2013
dc_description_s: This point dataset represents physical locations of potential geothermal energy sites in the United States. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for renewable and electric energy in the U.S. This layer is from the 2013 Spring Quarter update (Update 1011).This shapefile can be used to locate potential geothermal energy sites in the United States.
